metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7186 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The redirection implementation in parse.y in GNU Bash through 4.3 bash43-026 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds array access and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted use of here documents, aka the "redir_stack" issue.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-7186` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bash - 4.3-7ubuntu1.4
bash-builtins - 4.3-7ubuntu1.4
bash-static - 4.3-7ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bash package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3-7ubuntu1.4').
